Facebook Ego Network Visualization

This project showcases interactive visualizations of the Facebook Ego Network. Plot 1 is a static export (PNG) of a Node-Link Diagram, and Plot 2 includes interactive visualizations (HTML) for degree distribution and node metric correlations.

HFT Strategy Generator

AI-Powered High-Frequency Trading (HFT) Strategy Generator - A Python framework that uses LLMs to generate, backtest, and optimize intraday trading strategies.

A Vagrant-based solution for downloading and processing IEX market data (DEEP feeds) at scale.

Auto Resume Generator

Leverages Gemini API to analyze job descriptions and user resume data, then generates a tailored PDF resume optimized for ATS and job requirements.
